sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action updates user attributes in box that may involve a role change from user to co-owner and vice versa for an existing user in box account of the associated credentials.

Inputs:

  • User ID - The user ID of an existing user in box.
  • Name - Name of the user in box.
  • Role - The user’s enterprise role can be co-admin or user.
  • Job Title - The user's job title. E.g. CEO
  • Phone - The user's phone number.
  • Address - The user's address.
  • Status - Status of user. Can be set to Active, Inactive, Cannot Delete Edit, or Cannot Delete Edit Upload.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • User with given ID not found.
  • Invalid input parameters in request.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Update User

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action updates user attributes in box that may involve a role change from user to co-owner and vice versa for an existing user in box account of the associated credentials.

Inputs:

  • User ID - The user ID of an existing user in box.
  • Name - Name of the user in box.
  • Role - The user’s enterprise role can be co-admin or user.
  • Job Title - The user's job title. E.g. CEO
  • Phone - The user's phone number.
  • Address - The user's address.
  • Status - Status of user. Can be set to Active, Inactive, Cannot Delete Edit, or Cannot Delete Edit Upload.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • User with given ID not found.
  • Invalid input parameters in request.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
